Yes! How does this only have 4 votes? Iron golems only attack mobs and are only good for that purpose. They should be used in player warfare as well.

I'm sorry it's so long. :) I've been looking forward to recommending this and having it added to the game. I was considering mailing this, handwritten to Mojang, but I couldn't figure where to send it. Then I found this website. Great job creators!

Man great idea we only have hoglins that are only found in wastes and crimson forest great idea man but i cant touch it they are cute
I agree entirely. The strider was a major step in the right direction, but there is still so much potential in the nether update and beyond.
The Cherufe has a special saddle that allows the rider to not burn in lava. It is made by using a saddle, a glass pane, three Netherite Ingots, two gold ingots, a chest, and a lead.

The scarification of a pet in order to tame the Cherufe is based on a Mapuche mythology tale of this creature. I’m order to pacify these beast and make them stop causing ground breaking disasters. The people would have to sacrifice a virgin woman to these beast. Sound familiar? But because their are now virgin woman in Minecraft, a pet you have tamed would work instead.
The Cherufe would look like a combination of the two pictures you can see above.
I absolutely love this idea. No more words are needed.
The Achievement of Taming a Cherufe would be called “A Fiery Sacrifice”

Yo my mc java username is Stinkbugs!

Sounds great but a little bare bones and hollow, how about a room deep underground in the nether that has a low chance of even spawning but when you find it you can fight the nether beast boss and get a special item?
Making netherite renewable. However, tools and armor (except hoes) won't because diamond is not renewable.

It seems to give you too little for it’s rarity. I’ve played Minecraft for probably about 6 years and I’ve not once found a zombie or skeleton with diamond armor. So either it should spawn in a little more commonly or the rewards should be boosted from 0-2 netherite scrap to maybe 4-6 netherite ingots. Or maybe even both! I know ancient debris is supposed to be rare, however, it isn’t so rare you’ll only find it as rarely as a zombie with full diamond armor spawning in. Just saying!
We already have enough trouble mining for Ancient Debris.
It's not just about the trouble, though. This would break up some of the monotony of mining, plus the tunnels created could potentially expose more Ancient Debris.
Maybe you could use a chorus twig to get a Ender dragon pet. That would be slightly OP so maybe it’s only horse sized and is not as powerful.

Nice idea but emeralds and nether star???? There is literally no point to go to all this trouble to summon and kill it.Also where did the emeralds come from. Then you get some awesome boost or access to new locations which hold unique treasures and cool building blocks

This is my first feedback post hope you like it

Welcome to the feedback site! I cleared up your topic to make it easier to search for. We'd love to hear more - how would you tame a baby creeper?

Of related interest, you may want to check out: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360018509092-All-mob-taming 

Thanks for your contribution!

I'd tame the baby creeper with a cake (smothering the gunpowder inside with frosting, I suppose? It just seems right). Cakes also have the right colour scheme (kinda) to be associated with TNT, and also don't have a fantastic use except as a while-you're-leaving-your-house snack. I think this would be very interesting. Perhaps they could ward off witches, a bit like how cats repel creepers?

This would be so fun. What happens when they grow up? Do they grow up? Maybe you don't need to tame them, but they'll stop chasing you and dance when the music discs are played?

What about note blocks?
